did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Sand, Knud Aage Buchtrup. Legal Medicine, its Origin, Development and Status in Modern Times, with Special Regard to Denmark

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Typed copy of Sand's introductory lecture delivered at the Institute of Legal Medicine of the University of Copenhagen, September 9, 1925, on the history of legalized medicine.

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Sand, Knud Aage Buchtrup, Legal Medicine, its Origin, Development and Status in Modern Times, with Special Regard to Denmark, Crerar Ms 29, [Box #, Folder #], Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Typed copy of Sand's introductory lecture delivered at the Institute of Legal Medicine of the University of Copenhagen, September 9, 1925, on the history of legalized medicine. Originally published in Ugeskrift for laeger, (Copenhagen: 1926). Translated from Danish into English by J. Christian Bay. Copy made by J. Christian Bay.
